dialogueSegments.text: Rose! Is that you? I finally opened my own restaurant!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: That you did little guy. You’re all grown up now. Brewing your first coffee as well I see.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: Yeah! Wanna try it? Your restaurant always had the best coffee.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: If you insist, little guy. Let’s give this brew a shot.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: Chef! What is this? Did you even filter it?! I can still taste the crust!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: Is that not how you brew coffee?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: No, Chef. You have to tailor every order to the customer! No two customers are the same, you know.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose

dialogueSegments.text: I see! So I can’t just use the same technique every time?
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: That’s right Chef, you’re a quick learner! Now please, go out and try again! I’ll be waiting!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Rose
